title: Hello World Example
errorExplaination:
You are on this page because it is not in the webconfig routes list. The content displayed here comme from url /english/error.html because it is the page used for all url /english/*. In order to allow this page to corretly --generate a static page, the output value is setted to /english/error.html.

However for all others not existing pages because of pageNotFound value is /erreur.html, it's the entry with url /erreur.html which is used.

Finally you could see the template engine used for the file views/error.htm is pug.
